channel.title: Docker Registry on The Linuxian
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Registry on The Linuxian

item.title: Setup Private Docker Registry
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial we are going to learn about Docker registry and how to setup your own private registry with self-sign certificates. I hope you have read previous posts on docker basics and it’s concepts. What is Docker Registry? A registry is a storage and content delivery system, holding named Docker images, available in different tagged versions. There are to types of Registry: Public Registry : The default registry for all images.
